	# Create an HTTP client
	http_client = system.net.httpClient()

	# Get reference to the Flex Repeater
	flex_repeater = self.getChild("FlexRepeater")
	
	# Create instances list dynamically
	instances = []
	for movie in movies:
	    instance = {
	        "viewPath": "New Folder/card3",  # The path to your embedded view
	        "params": {
	            "title": movie.get("title", "Unknown Title"),
	            "imgPath": "https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/" + movie.get("poster_path", ""),
	            "rate": movie.get("vote_average", "N/A")
	        }
	    }
	    instances.append(instance)
	
	# Assign the instances to the Flex Repeater
	self.session.custom.instances = instances
